name: VTA: ACCESS Paratransit
description: Door-to-door transit throughout Santa Clara County
fullDescription: VTA ACCESS is an ADA paratransit service providing door-to-door transportation for Santa Clara County residents who cannot use regular VTA buses or light rail due to a disability.
whatTheyOffer:
- Door-to-door shared ride service
- Service throughout Santa Clara County
- Reservations accepted 1-7 days in advance
- Wheelchair accessible vehicles
- Personal care attendants ride free
howToGetIt:
1. Complete the VTA ACCESS eligibility application
2. Download application at vta.org or call for copy
3. In-person eligibility assessment required
4. Once certified, schedule rides by phone
keywords: VTA ACCESS, paratransit, ADA, Santa Clara County, San Jose, disability, wheelchair, door to door
